promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic strong beetle fighting-type pokemon with a ancient crystal core. It can be found in arena-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fighting or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystabrax, a a dynamic strong beetle fighting-type pokemon. It can be found in arena-like environments It has the following abilities: Gutsy Hammer. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "beetle", "fighting" or "Crystabrax". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fighting-type pokemon, beetle-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, red and purple ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This brawny insect gladiator thrives in competition grounds, using its Gutsy Hammer ability to shatter adversaries.
